    • createBoardElement

      @Contract(pure=true) @NotNull protected @NotNull Element createBoardElement(@NotNull @NotNull Document newDocument)
      Description copied from class: PuzzleExporter
      Creates an XML element representing the board of the puzzle. Subclasses must implement this method to provide the XML structure for the board.
      Specified by:
      createBoardElement in class PuzzleExporter
      Parameters:
      newDocument - The XML document to create elements within.
      Returns:
      An XML element representing the puzzle's board.
